equipmentOptions: Choose A or B: (A) Calligrapher's Supplies, Book (prayers), Holy Symbol, Parchment (10 sheets), Robe, 8 GP; or (B) 50 GP

name: Anthropologist
equipmentOptions: A leather-bound diary, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, a set of traveler's clothes, one trinket of special significance, and a pouch containing 10 gp

name: Archaeologist
equipmentOptions: Choose A or B: (A) Cartographer's Tools, Bullseye Lantern, Map, Map or Scroll Case, Shovel, Tent, Traveler's Clothes, 17 GP; or (B) 50 GP

name: Artisan
equipmentOptions: Choose A or B: (A) Artisan's Tools (same as above), 2 Pouches, Traveler's Clothes, 32 GP; or (B) 50 GP

equipmentOptions: A set of traveler's clothes, a diary, an ink pen, a bottle of ink, and a pouch containing 10 gp

name: Athlete
equipmentOptions: A bronze discus or leather ball, a lucky charm or past trophy, a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp

name: Augen Trust (Spy)
equipmentOptions: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Azorius Functionary

name: Baldur's Gate Acolyte
equipmentOptions: A holy symbol (a gift to you when you entered the priesthood), a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Charlatan
equipmentOptions: A set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, tools of the con of your choice (ten stoppered bottles filled with colored liquid, a set of weighted dice, a deck of marked cards, or a signet ring of an imaginary duke), and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Criminal
equipmentOptions: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Entertainer
equipmentOptions: A musical instrument (one of your choice), the favor of an admirer (love letter, lock of hair, or trinket), costume clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Folk Hero
equipmentOptions: A set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Guild Artisan
equipmentOptions: A set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a letter of introduction from your guild, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Hermit
equipmentOptions: A scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, an herbalism kit, and 5 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Noble
equipmentOptions: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 25 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Outlander
equipmentOptions: A staff, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Sage
equipmentOptions: A bottle of black ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Sailor
equipmentOptions: A belaying pin (club), silk rope (50 feet), a lucky charm such as a rabbit foot or a small stone with a hole in the center (or you may roll for a random trinket on the Trinkets table in chapter 5), a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Soldier
equipmentOptions: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy (a dagger, broken blade, or piece of a banner), a bone dice set or playing card set, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Baldur's Gate Urchin
equipmentOptions: A small knife, a map of the city you grew up in, a pet mouse, a token to remember your parents by, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Boros Legionnaire
equipmentOptions: A Boros insignia, a feather from an angel's wing, a tattered piece of a Boros banner (a souvenir from a famous battle), a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 2 gp (Boros-minted 1-zino coins)

name: Carouser
equipmentOptions: Choose A or B: (A) Dagger, Gaming Set (same as above), Fine Clothes, Glass Bottle, Mirror, Perfume, Pouch, Tinderbox, 19 GP; or (B) 50 GP

equipmentOptions: Disguise kit, a set of fine clothes, and a belt pouch containing 30 gp.

equipmentOptions: Choose A or B: (A) Forgery Kit, Costume, Fine Clothes, 15 GP; or (B) 50 GP

name: Cloistered Scholar
equipmentOptions: The scholar's robes of your cloister, a writing kit (small pouch with a quill, ink, folded parchment, and a small penknife), a borrowed book on the subject of your current study, and a pouch containing 10 gp

equipmentOptions: A bottle of black ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Courtier
equipmentOptions: A set of fine clothes and a pouch containing 5 gp

equipmentOptions: Choose A or B: (A) 2 Daggers, Thieves' Tools, Crowbar, 2 Pouches, Traveler's Clothes, 16 GP; or (B) 50 GP
